text: Ronald Peter "Percy" Freeman (4 July 1945 - 5 January 2016) was an English footballer. He played as a forward. He played for Lincoln City, West Bromwich Albion, Reading, Stourbridge and Boston United. He was born in Newark-on- Trent, Nottinghamshire. Freeman died after an illness on 5 January 2016, aged 70. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Disease- related deaths in England Category:English footballers Category:Reading F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Nottinghamshire Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players
title: Percy Freeman
